name: Slurp Ninja
description:
In Slurp Ninja, Slurpy the Frog must survive a harrowing gauntlet in order to save the empire from certain doom.

For the best player experience, download one of the executables. Music doesn't work properly in the browser.

Music / SFX by https://twitter.com/ChrisBaklid
Art by https://twitter.com/AlexKamien
Design, programming, and additional art by https://lemonsaur.us
